item.title: Standalone Spring tests
item.author: 7nolikov@gmail.com (Dmitrii Novikov)
item.description: I was surprised that Spring Test library doesn’t support standalone acceptance tests format out of the box. Here’s how I tackled this issue and why standalone tests are useful for modular Spring applications.
